Signals¶

bhp_bucket: uses a post_save() signal that listens for an instance with a base model BaseUuidModel or BaseUuidModel.

bhp_bucket.models.model_bucket_rules_on_save(sender, instance, **kwargs)[source]¶

update / run model bucket rules, see bhp_bucket
